properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 2:21AM PST until January 8 at 3:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 8 to 10 feet at 13 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST WEDNESDAY
